short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When enabled, sends signals to the dataLayer that can be used to change the behavior of GTM for internal employees or agencies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension serves a simple purpose: To send the name of your employer to Google Tag Manager so that GTM can make different choices or send data different places if you are on your employer or a client's website. 

The extension makes two pushes to the GTM dataLayer:
1. a single value of "iWorkAtEnabled" set to true (if plugin is installed/enabled)
2. the event "i-work-at-loaded", along with  a variable, "iWorkAt" containing the name of the user's employer, as entered into the plugin.
